mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO T13_NOTICE ( NOTICE , NOTICE_DATE , NOTICE_TIME , LATITUDE , LONGITUDE , CREATE_PER , CREATE_DATE , CREATE_TIME ) VALUES ( #{notice} , #{noticeDate} , #{noticeTime} , #{latitude} , #{longitude} , #{createPer} , #{createDate} , #{createTime} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update: UPDATE T13_NOTICE SET NOTICE = #{notice} , NOTICE_DATE = #{noticeDate} , NOTICE_TIME = #{noticeTime} , LATITUDE = #{latitude} , LONGITUDE = #{longitude} , CREATE_PER = #{createPer} , CREATE_DATE = #{createDate} , CREATE_TIME = #{createTime} WHERE ID = #{iD}
mapper.select: SELECT ID AS "iD" , NOTICE AS "notice" , NOTICE_DATE AS "noticeDate" , NOTICE_TIME AS "noticeTime" , LATITUDE AS "latitude" , LONGITUDE AS "longitude" , CREATE_PER AS "createPer" , CREATE_DATE AS "createDate" , CREATE_TIME AS "createTime" FROM T13_NOTICE WHERE ID = #{iD}

SELECT ID AS "iD" , NOTICE AS "notice" , NOTICE_DATE AS "noticeDate" , NOTICE_TIME AS "noticeTime" , LATITUDE AS "latitude" , LONGITUDE AS "longitude" , CREATE_PER AS "createPer" , CREATE_DATE AS "createDate" , CREATE_TIME AS "createTime" FROM T13_NOTICE WHERE ID = #{iD} FOR UPDATE

SELECT ID AS "iD" , NOTICE AS "notice" , NOTICE_DATE AS "noticeDate" , NOTICE_TIME AS "noticeTime" , LATITUDE AS "latitude" , LONGITUDE AS "longitude" , CREATE_PER AS "createPer" , CREATE_DATE AS "createDate" , CREATE_TIME AS "createTime" FROM T13_NOTICE WHERE ${_dynamicWhereCondition} ORDER BY ID ORDER BY ${_orderByCondition} FETCH FIRST ${_fetchFirstCondition} ROWS ONLY LIMIT ${_limitCondition} OFFSET ${_offsetCondition}
